Scratch
=============

Scratch is meant to analise finished simulations and keep some results.

The current space is:

    - Capacity: 2.0T  
    - Occupied : 2.0T  
    - Available: 23G  
    - Usage : 99%

Under **/scratch/jobs/<user_name>** each user has his own private folder to work with
